snippet.title: Anthem Gameplay Features – Our World, My Story Trailer
snippet.description:
At the heart of Anthem is the concept of Our World, My Story – the distinctive combination of a shared, dynamic world and a personal story. Discover how these two elements help create a connected world that remains unique to every player. Subscribe and be the first to see Anthem trailers and gameplay videos: http://bit.ly/2qZN5QV.

Discover more: http://x.ea.com/32090.
